verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> an <S%G32>angel<s%> coming <S%G2597>down<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, <S%G2192>having<s%> the <S%G2807>key<s%> of the <S%G12>abyss<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G254>chain<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he laid <S%G2902>hold<s%> on the <S%G1404>dragon<s%>, the <S%G744>old<s%> <S%G3789>serpent<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G1228>Devil<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1210>bound<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> for a <S%G5507>thousand<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G12>abyss<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2808>shut<s%> <S%G846>it<s%>, <S%G2808><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4972>sealed<s%> it <S%G1883>over<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> he should <S%G4105>deceive<s%> the <S%G1484>nations<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G2089>more<s%>, <S%G891>until<s%> the <S%G5507>thousand<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> should be <S%G5055>finished<s%>: <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G5023>this<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> must <S%G1163>be<s%> <S%G3089>loosed<s%> for a <S%G3398>little<s%> <S%G5550>time<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G2362>thrones<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G2523>sat<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2917>judgment<s%> was <S%G1325>given<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> I saw the <S%G5590>souls<s%> of them that had been <S%G3990>beheaded<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> the <S%G3141>testimony<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3748>such<s%> <S%G4352>as<s%> <S%G4352>worshipped<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G2342>beast<s%>, <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1504>image<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G5480>mark<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3359>forehead<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G2198>lived<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G936>reigned<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> a <S%G5507>thousand<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%>.

<S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3062>rest<s%> of the <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G326>lived<s%> not3756, 326 <S%G2193>until<s%> the <S%G5507>thousand<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> should be <S%G5055>finished<s%>. <S%G3778>This<s%> is the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G386>resurrection<s%>.

Blessed <S%G3107><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G40>holy<s%> is he that <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G3313>part<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G386>resurrection<s%>: <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G5130>these<s%> the <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> they shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G2409>priests<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> shall <S%G936>reign<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> a <S%G5507>thousand<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> the <S%G5507>thousand<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> are <S%G5055>finished<s%>, <S%G4567>Satan<s%> shall be <S%G3089>loosed<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5438>prison<s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> shall come <S%G1831>forth<s%> to <S%G4105>deceive<s%> the <S%G1484>nations<s%> which <S%G3588>are<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G1137>corners<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%>, <S%G1136>Gog<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3098>Magog<s%>, to <S%G4863>gather<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G4863>together<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G4171>war<s%>: the <S%G706>number<s%> of <S%G3739>whom<s%> is <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G285>sand<s%> of the <S%G2281>sea<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they went <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> the <S%G4114>breadth<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2944>compassed<s%> the <S%G3925>camp<s%> of the <S%G40>saints<s%> <S%G2944>about<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G25>beloved<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4442>fire<s%> came down2597, 575, 2316 out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2719>devoured<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%> that <S%G4105>deceived<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> was <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3041>lake<s%> of <S%G4442>fire<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2303>brimstone<s%>, <S%G3699>where<s%> are also the <S%G2342>beast<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the false <S%G5578>prophet<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> they shall be <S%G928>tormented<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G165>ever<s%> and <S%G165>ever<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G2362>throne<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> him that <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G846>it<s%>, <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3772>heaven<s%> fled <S%G5343>away<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> there was <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> for <S%G846>them<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%>, the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3398>small<s%>, <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G2316>throne<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G975>books<s%> were <S%G455>opened<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G975>book<s%> was <S%G455>opened<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the book of <S%G2222>life<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%> were <S%G2919>judged<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3588>things<s%> which were <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G975>books<s%>, according <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%> gave <S%G1325>up<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%> that were <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>it<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G86>Hades<s%> gave <S%G1325>up<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%> that were <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> they were <S%G2919>judged<s%> every <S%G1538>man<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G86>Hades<s%> were <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3041>lake<s%> of <S%G4442>fire<s%>. <S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%>, even the lake of fire.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G2147>was<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G976>book<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%>, he was <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3041>lake<s%> of <S%G4442>fire<s%>.
